io.github.thunderbots.lightning.opmode

Class CompoundOpMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qualcomm.robotcore.eventloop.opmode.OpMode
      • com.qualcomm.robotcore.eventloop.opmode.LinearOpMode
        • io.github.thunderbots.lightning.opmode.LightningOpMode
          • io.github.thunderbots.lightning.opmode.CompoundOpMode
  • Deprecated. 
    CompoundOpMode as a whole is untested and unconfirmed. It will likely work to some extent, but because of the high number of threads associated with using multiple op modes simultaneously, it will break down when trying to run too many simultaneous op modes.

    A CompoundOpMode is an op mode that includes the functionality of several different op modes.


    @Deprecated
public class CompoundOpMode
extends LightningOpMode
    Author:
    Zach Ohara

      CompoundOpMode as a whole is untested and unconfirmed. It will likely work to some extent, but because of the high number of threads associated with using multiple op modes simultaneously, it will break down when trying to run too many simultaneous op modes.

      Constructs a new compound op mode with the given list of op modes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CompoundOpMode

        @Deprecated
public CompoundOpMode(LightningOpMode[] opmodes)
        Deprecated. CompoundOpMode as a whole is untested and unconfirmed. It will likely work to some extent, but because of the high number of threads associated with using multiple op modes simultaneously, it will break down when trying to run too many simultaneous op modes.

        Constructs a new compound op mode with the given list of op modes.

        Parameters:
        opmodes - the list of op modes to be combined.
        See Also:
        opmodes

    • Method Detail

      • initializeRobot

        protected void initializeRobot()
        Deprecated. 
        Initializes the robot. This can be defined however it is seen fit by the specific overriding op mode.
        Specified by:
        initializeRobot in class LightningOpMode

      • main

        protected void main()
        Deprecated. 
        Executes the 'main procedure' of the op mode. This method will run either until interrupted by the system, or until the method returns.
        Specified by:
        main in class LightningOpMode
